00032 struct InputEvent
00033 {
00034         // Supported event types.
00035         enum Type 
00036         { 
00038                 Move, 
00041                 Down, 
00044                 Up, 
00047                 Trace, 
00050                 Untrace,
00051 
00054                 Click,
00057                 DB_Click,
00060                 Move_Left,
00063                 Move_Right,
00066                 Move_Up,
00069                 Move_Down,
00072                 Split_Start,
00075                 Split_End,
00078                 Split_Apart,
00081                 Split_Close,
00084                 Rotate_Start,
00087                 Rotate_End,
00091                 Rotate_Counterclock,
00095                 Rotate_Clock
00096         };
00097 
00098         // id of the source of this event. Input services associate unique ids to each of their event sources.
00099     unsigned int sourceId;
00100         
00101         // Type of the service that generated this event.
00102         enum InputService::ServiceType serviceType;
00103 
00104         // Unique id of the service that generated this event.
00105         int serviceId;
00106 
00107         // The event type.
00108     enum Type type;
00109 
00110         // Event flags.
00111         unsigned int flags;
00112 
00113         // Event timestamp.
00114         unsigned int timestamp;
00115 
00116         // Position.
00117     float x;
00118         float y;
00119         float z;
00120         
00121         // Second finger position.
00122         float x2;
00123         float y2;
00124         
00125         // 2D Split/Zoom gestures.
00126         float deltaDist; // Delta distance in pixels.
00127         float deltaRatio; // Delta ratio to the last last distance of the two fingers.
00128 
00129         // Rotation.
00130         float rw;
00131     float rx;
00132         float ry;
00133         float rz;
00134 
00135         //Point set
00136         int numberOfPoints;
00137         Vector3f pointSet[32];
00138 };
00139 
00140 }; // namespace omega
